means: [人名] [北方英格兰人、苏格兰人姓氏] 霍利戴 Halliday的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"假日，节日"之意。
means: holiday ： 指按规定不工作的各种假日，时间可长可短。在英国复数形式表示较长的假期。
festival ： 指公众庆祝、欢度的节日。
vacation ： 通常指时间较长的假期，如学校的寒暑假等。
leave ： 主要指政府机关工作人员或军队人员获准的休假、假期。

sentence.Network_en: People are having to think hard about their holiday plans.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们现在得仔细地琢磨自己的度假计划。

sentence.Network_en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的旅游报价和那些度假手册里的价格相去甚远。

sentence.Network_en: The trading day is shortened in observance of the Labor Day holiday.
sentence.Network_cn: 因庆祝劳工节，这个交易日交易时间缩短了。

encyclopedia.content: 专 辑：Holiday郑秀文专辑《Holiday》 专 辑：Holiday 歌 手：郑秀文语 言：粤语专辑1CD 公 司：华星唱片 日 期：1991.05 专辑曲目： 1.不来的季节 2.情人休息 3.情尽变 4.GO GO ADIOS 5.醉乡 6.情断维也纳 7.VALENTINO 8.FRIENDS 9.暧昧 10.告别温室 有了《郑秀文》这样一个不错的开端，从一年之后的这张《HOLIDAY》开始，郑秀文就开始积极努力尝试着不同风格的音乐作品，使她在华星的每张专辑都显得诚意十足。 开篇“不来的季节

entry.def: A holiday is a period of time during which you relax and enjoy yourself away from home. People sometimes refer to their holiday as their holidays.

example.ex: I've just come back from a holiday in the United States...
We rang Duncan to ask where he was going on holiday...
example.tran: 我们打电话给邓肯，问他要去哪里度假。

entry.def: A holiday is a day when people do not go to work or school because of a religious or national festival.

example.ex: New Year's Day is a public holiday throughout Britain...
example.tran: 元旦是全英国的公众假日。

example.ex: He invited her to spend the Fourth of July holiday at his summer home on Fire Island...
example.tran: 他邀请她去自己在法尔岛上的消夏寓所过美国独立纪念日。

entry.def: The holidays are the time when children do not have to go to school.

example.ex: ...the first day of the school holidays.

entry.def: If you have a particular number of days' or weeks' holiday, you do not have to go to work for that number of days or weeks.

example.ex: Every worker will be entitled to four weeks' paid holiday a year.
example.tran: 每位工人每年都能享受4周的带薪休假。

entry.def: If you are holidaying in a place away from home, you are on holiday there.

example.ex: Sampling the local cuisine is one of the delights of holidaying abroad...
example.tran: 品尝当地菜肴是海外度假的乐趣之一。

example.ex: Vacant rooms on the campus were being used by holidaying families.
example.tran: 校园里的闲置宿舍住着一些度假的家庭。

means.word_mean: 1. leisure time away from work devoted to rest or pleasure;

sentences.sentence: "we get two weeks of vacation every summer"
"we took a short holiday in Puerto Rico"

means.word_mean: 2. a day on which work is suspended by law or custom;

sentences.sentence: "no mail is delivered on federal holidays"
"it's a good thing that New Year's was a holiday because everyone had a hangover"

example.en: On the ship there'd a holiday that has been left, owing to neglect.
example.zh: 那船上有一小块地方因为疏忽而没有漆着。

list.explanation: [军队用语]被遗忘或忽略的工作、任务

example.en: You must as soon as possible finish the holiday that you've forgotten yesterday.
example.zh: 你必须尽快完成你昨天忘了的那项工作。

Sentence.sentence: Although many other big firms resisted the temptation to over-borrow, developers borrowed heavily and built bigger and fancier hotels as if the whole world were planning a holiday in Las Vegas.
Do we or do we not go on holiday
I say you only live once and we work hard and what's the point if you can't go on holiday
The plane, a Boeing 737, taking German holiday makers to the island crashed into a hillside as it circled while preparing to land.

sentences.en: The Fourth of July is the national holiday of the US.
sentences.cn: 七月四日是美国国庆日。

jushi.chinese: 我们度过了一个快乐的假期。
我的度假计划是可以改变的。

jushi.english: The children were full of excitement at the thought of their coming holiday.
jushi.chinese: 想到假期即将来临,孩子们十分激动。
